identity.name: E1_Utility_Prime
identity.archetype: Soft Utility / The Performance Pro Hybrid
identity.core_principle: Clarity through Contrast. No generic gradients.
identity.vibe: Professional, geometric, highly legible, but with a 'tactile' quality that feels premium.

rules: Headings must be 'Outfit'. Body must be 'Public Sans'.
Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings larger than 24px.
Use 'tabular-nums' for all financial data (Budgets in Clients tab) and dates.

usage_rules: Primary color is Deep Indigo (approx #4F46E5). Use for CTAs and active states.
FORBIDDEN: Do not use Teal (#1B93A4) for any UI element.
Sidebar in Light Mode: Must be Dark (Slate-900) for high contrast navigation.
Sidebar in Dark Mode: Matches background but with a subtle border-right.
Success States: Use Emerald Green, not standard Green.
Budget/Money Text: Use Monospace font or tabular-nums.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous (2x standard). Use p-6 or p-8 for card padding.

structure.dashboard: Sidebar Layout (Fixed Left, 250px) + Scrollable Main Content.
structure.mobile: Hamburger menu triggers Sheet component for sidebar.
structure.grid_system: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density) for Admin Dashboard stats.

container_rules: Max width for content: max-w-7xl mx-auto.
Cards: 'Cardless' look for lists. Use borders between rows instead of boxing everything.
Widgets: Use 'Crystal Glass' style (white/70 backdrop-blur) for floating summary cards.

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

textures.noise: Optional: Add a 2% noise overlay on the sidebar for tactile feel.

images.description: Abstract white/gray concrete architecture. Use for Login Page Split Layout (Left side image, Right side form).
Professional silhouette or generic avatar. Use for 'Profile' in sidebar.

implementation_instructions.step_1_setup: Update index.css with the provided CSS variables for the Indigo/Slate theme.
implementation_instructions.step_2_layout: Create a `Layout` component that includes the Sidebar (fixed left) and Topbar (mobile only). Wrap all protected routes in this.
implementation_instructions.step_3_auth: Build the Login page using the 'Split Layout' pattern (Image left, Form right). Center the form vertically.
implementation_instructions.step_4_dashboard: Implement the Admin Dashboard using a Bento Grid. Top row: 4 Stats Cards (Total Employees, Active Tasks, Monthly Budget, Clients).
implementation_instructions.step_5_clients: Build the Clients tab using Shadcn `Table`. Columns: Nume SRL, Tip Proiect, Buget (MDL), Status (Badge).
implementation_instructions.step_6_tasks: Use a Kanban board or List view for tasks. Add a 'Calendar' view using `react-day-picker` (Shadcn Calendar) customized to show dots for due dates.
implementation_instructions.step_7_theme: Implement the ThemeProvider context to toggle the `.dark` class on the html/body element.
universal_rules: ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs) must have `data-testid` attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or the provided image textures.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
universal_guidelines.interaction: Add `active:scale-95` to all buttons for tactile feedback.
universal_guidelines.spacing: Use `gap-6` or `gap-8` in grids. Don't crowd data.
universal_guidelines.z_index: Use proper z-index layering for sticky headers and modals.
